name: Unholy Union
description:
My entry for boojam 2015!

Instructions:

  1. Capture ghosts by playing the match 3 game (to make moves use the mouse to click a piece and drag it in the direction you want to move it)
  2. Buy traps to increase how many boobux you earn per second
  3. Buy abilities as you unlock them to improve your earning rate!
  4. Swear at me because you wasted your time with this
  5. Swear at @cjacobwade @kinifi and @Kevin_T_Knight for thinking this jam was a good idea
